
# Contribute

We encourage contributions of datasets and search results! 


## Contributing Study Data

To contribute one or more studies follow the steps below. Send link(s) to the article(s) to matthew.jane@uconn.edu. To submit a raw dataset as a CSV, you can send it via email (matthew.jane@uconn.edu) or by submitting a pull-request on [github]((https://github.com/MatthewBJane/utme-validity-meta-analysis)) to the folder titled [Dataset-Contributions][search_results.csv](https://github.com/MatthewBJane/utme-validity-meta-analysis/Dataset-Contributions).

## Contributing a Search

To contribute a list of search results, please provide a CSV file formatted the same way as [search_results.csv](https://github.com/MatthewBJane/utme-validity-meta-analysis/search_results.csv) in the [github repository](https://github.com/MatthewBJane/utme-validity-meta-analysis). To submit the CSV, you can send it via email (matthew.jane@uconn.edu) or by submitting a pull-request to the folder titled [Search-Contributions][search_results.csv](https://github.com/MatthewBJane/utme-validity-meta-analysis/Search-Contributions).
